casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kenneth Vernon GOLDER 79PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 8, 2019

Anne Bleyman, Attorney at Law, For Golder, Kenneth Vernon.

Michael T. Henry, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. G. Glenn Gerding, Attorney at Law, for N.C. Advocates for Justice. John F. Carella, Staff Attorney, for N.C. Advocates for Justice. Ivy Johnson, Attorney at Law, for N.C. Advocates for Justice. N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 7th of August 2019 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of August 2019."
